section.title: Analysis: DWA
section.simpara: The DWA system from Dyalog allows for minimal overhead functions to be created by sharing data structures. This will require some important considerations when dealing with the array representations used by the Co-dfns compiler.

listitem.simpara: The DWA system should be used for handling inter-system communication between the interpreter and the compiler, and this will in turn inform the runtime design of the system.
